text:
<@U03QEU2MF5G> You need to URL *Encode* and maybe to *Decode* on the page where the query parameter are used.

*Encode*: `{{ company.name|urlencode }}`
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/filters#urlencode>

*Decode:* `{{ company.name|urldecode }}`
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/filters#urldecode>
